sqlMap.select: SELECT designer_id FROM (SELECT designer_id, count(id) as ct FROM blog WHERE archived = 0 GROUP BY designer_id ORDER BY ct DESC) a LIMIT #value#
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM blog WHERE archived = 0 ORDER BY update_time DESC) a LIMIT #base#,#range#;
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM blog WHERE archived = 0 ORDER BY click_count DESC) a LIMIT #base#,#range#;
SELECT * FROM blog WHERE id = #value# AND archived = 0
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM blog WHERE type = #type# AND archived = 0 ORDER BY update_time DESC) a LIMIT #base#,#range#
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM blog WHERE designer_id = #designerId# AND archived = 0 ORDER BY update_time DESC) a LIMIT #base#,#range#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE blog SET archived = 1 WHERE id = #id#
UPDATE blog SET title = #title#, pure_content = #pureContent#, content = #content#, update_time = current_timestamp(), type = #type#, reprinted = #reprinted# WHERE id = #id#
UPDATE blog SET click_count = click_count+1 WHERE id = #id# AND archived = 0
